page.pg_title: Benefits of using the Map tab

text_content.paragraph: The Map tab gives you access to a quick visualization of leases, properties, landgrids and wells.

graphic.alt: Photo/Graphic of Graphic of map search results.

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.
